addUniqueConstraint.columnNames: SERVERID, SERVICEID, AGGREGATIONTYPE, SOURCEPATH, FILENAME, AGGREGATIONNAME
FILEID, MEDIATIONSERVERID, SERVICEID, PLUGINID, STATUS, WRITEFILEPATH, WRITEFILENAME
FILEID, SERVICEID, DRIVERID, STATUS, WRITEFILEPATH, WRITEFILENAME
FILEID, SERVICEID, STATUS, WRITEFILEPATH, WRITEFILENAME, SOURCEFILEPATH, SOURCEFILENAME, SOURCEFILESIZE

column.name: SERVERID
column.remarks: Primary Key field.

column.name: SERVERNAME
column.remarks: Unique identity of connection

column.name: SERVERIP
column.remarks: Server''s IP address to establish SSH connection

column.name: SERVERPORT
column.remarks: Server''s IP port to establish SSH connection

column.name: USERNAME
column.remarks: Username of remote server access.

column.name: PASSWORD
column.remarks: Password for SSH connection

column.name: OS
column.remarks: Which Operating System is installed i.e. WINDOWS or LINUX

column.name: STATUS
column.remarks: Whether the server is enabled or not. 1 : INACTIVE, 0: ACTIVE, -1 : DELETED'

column.name: CREATEDBYSTAFFID
column.remarks: Reference of user created the record

column.name: CREATEDDATE
column.remarks: Record creation date i.e. sysdate

column.name: LASTUPDATEDBYSTAFFID
column.remarks: Reference of user update the record

column.name: LASTUPDATEDDATE
column.remarks: Record updation date i.e. sysdate

column.name: FILEID
column.remarks: Primary Key field.

column.name: SERVERID
column.remarks: Server reference where the given path is placed

column.name: FILENAME
column.remarks: File Name entered in GUI

column.name: FILEPATH
column.remarks: Path of file where file having fileName is resided

column.name: FILETYPE
column.remarks: Possible Values :1-Executable only 2-Executable and Editable both 3-Editable only 4- ReadOnly'

column.name: EXENCOMMAND
column.remarks: Command to run the file with possible options.Mandatory for executable files.

column.name: STATUSCOMMAND
column.remarks: Linux command to know whether the script is running or completed.

column.name: STATUSCONTAINS
column.remarks: Specify a word/text which has to be part of statuscommand output to update the running status in UI.

column.name: FILEALIAS
column.remarks: Alias of the file name

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.remarks: Description about purpose of file

column.name: STATUS
column.remarks: Whether the server is enabled or not.1 : INACTIVE 0: ACTIVE -1 : DELETED

column.name: LOGPATH
column.remarks: Log path on same server.

column.name: LOGFILENAME
column.remarks: Log File on logpath specified.

column.name: CREATEDBYSTAFFID
column.remarks: Reference of user created the record

column.name: CREATEDDATE
column.remarks: Record creation date i.e. sysdate

column.name: LASTUPDATEDBYSTAFFID
column.remarks: Reference of user update the record

column.name: LASTUPDATEDDATE
column.remarks: Record updation date i.e. sysdate
